test-case.name: Ensure that the system should only accept whole numbers from 1 to 100

report.desc: [Allow Overbooking] Wait for element to display (10)
[Allow Overbooking] Click element
[Allowable Booking Capacity Input box] Wait for element to display (10)
[Allowable Booking Capacity Input box] Type "1.0"
Hover over element
"Accepts whole numbers only from 1 to 100" error message is present
